name: Urd Monster
description:
Control the lovable Urd in an adventure to save her friends! Sneak past the humans and punch through obstacles to help her accomplish her goal!

Press Z to transform, and X to use your secondary ability. Use the directional buttons to move.

Made by a two-man team for the Ludum Dare 33 jam.

Please vote for us if you can: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

Any feedback is appreciated. Thank you. :D
